document.full_text: wall street slipped on thursday after a major aftershock in japan reignited fears about its nuclear power crisis, but greater faith in the u.s. economy's steady path held losses in check.
document.title: wall street dips on japan aftershock; retailers rise
lines_and_colors: wall street slipped on thursday after a major aftershock in japan reignited fears about its nuclear power crisis, but greater faith in the u.s. economy's steady path held losses in check.
